Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a business or project for organizing financial data.

userId.description: Reference to the User who owns this project.

createdAt.description: The date the project was created.

parentProjectId.description: Optional reference to a parent project.

googleSheetId.description: Optional ID for a linked Google Sheet.

ChatMessage.title: Chat Message
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message in a user's chat history.

id.description: Unique identifier for the chat message.

userId.description: Reference to the User who owns this message.

content.description: The text content of the message.

timestamp.description: The time the message was sent.

Transaction.title: Transaction
Transaction.description: Represents an income, expense, or transfer transaction for a user.

Debt.title: Debt
Debt.description: Represents a debt owed to or by the user.

Creditor.title: Creditor
Creditor.description: Represents a person or entity to whom the user owes money.

userId.description: Reference to the User who owes this debt. (Relationship: User 1:N Creditor)

amount.description: The amount owed to the creditor.

dueDate.description: The date the debt is due.

description.description: Optional description or notes about the debt.

Debtor.title: Debtor
Debtor.description: Represents a person or entity who owes money to the user.

userId.description: Reference to the User who is owed this debt. (Relationship: User 1:N Debtor)

amount.description: The amount owed by the debtor.

dueDate.description: The date the debt is due.

description.description: Optional description or notes about the debt.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

email.description: The email address of the user.

BankAccount.title: Bank Account
BankAccount.description: Represents a bank account for a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the bank account.

userId.description: Reference to the User who owns this account.

name.description: The name of the bank account (e.g., 'Savings', 'Checking').

balance.description: The current balance of the account.

isPrimary.description: Indicates if this is the user's primary bank account.

Client.title: Client
Client.description: Represents a client or contact for a specific business/project.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: Represents a custom income or expense category for a specific business/project.

Task.title: Task
Task.description: Represents a task to be tracked by a user.

Hobby.title: Hobby
Hobby.description: Represents a hobby or activity a user wants to track.

Credential.title: Credential
Credential.description: Represents a stored credential (password, TOTP secret) for a user.
